faqs.question: What is Gemini AI?
faqs.answer: Gemini AI is Google's advanced AI model that can understand and generate human-like text.

faqs.question: How do I use Gemini in my Android app?
faqs.answer: You need to add the Google AI SDK dependency and get an API key from Google AI Studio.

faqs.question: Is Gemini free to use?
faqs.answer: Gemini has both free and paid tiers depending on usage volume.

features.name: Text Generation
features.description: Generates human-like text based on prompts
